sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./index.less"; import Navinput from "../component/navinput/index"; export default function height() { const [data, setData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const query = window.location.pathname.substring(8); console.log(query); const getData = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`https://api.fsn365.com/blocks/${query}`); setData(res.data.data); // console.log(res.data.data); }; getData(); }, []); console.log(data); return (

Blocks

{data && (

Height: {data.height}

Age: {data.age}

Transactions:

Block Miner: {data.miner}

Block Rewards: {data.reward}

Difficulty: {data.difficulty}

Total Difficulty: {data.totalDifficulty}

Size: {data.size}

Gas Limit: {data.gasLimit}

Hash: {data.hash}

Parent Hash:{data.parentHash}

)}
); }
